content: Not sure who might actually have any responsibility for this, but most of the doc links on the new Lean FRO Learn page seem to be broken.
also, i'm not sure if it's intentional, but removing the www. points to the old website, for those who don't like the new style :wink:
I think you are both looking at temporary inconsistency in your DNS caches. But I've edited the links to remove the indirection, they should be working now for everyone.
